name: Lgnorant girl doll
detailed_description:
This work is created with RPG Maker MV

● Story
Nana doll made with magic
One day she wakes up by accident
To go on a journey to fulfill the mission instructed by the creator.

The fight is orthodox RPG style.
Let's fight equipment, technology, and tools.

●Characters
・Nana
　A magical doll, a girl who got up to the crisis of the world
　She is just awake and does not know things well.

· Anna
　Knights of the Kingdom
　She is traveling with the order of the king
　She will meet Nana at that journey and act together

This work is created with RPG Maker MV

● Story

One day she wakes up by accident
To go on a journey to fulfill the mission instructed by the creator.

The fight is orthodox RPG style.
Let's fight equipment, technology, and tools.

short_description: Lgnorant girl doll is a game of two girls traveling in a wide world. They confront a lot of trials for their own mission. One person is a calm doll girl Another person is an emotional girl They will combine power and fight against terrible enemies Through the fields and dungeons, they become stronger.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7,8,10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
